com.ge.dspmicro.tcpsocketserver.api

Interface IAsyncMessageCallback

  • Deprecated. 
    Use java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel to manage socket connections.

    @Deprecated
public interface IAsyncMessageCallback
    Callback interface that a tcp socket server will provide to an OSGi registered SocketService implementations when a client is bound to a socket session with the service.

    The callback allows SocketService implementations to send asynchronous messages to bound socket clients.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean appendOutgoingQueue(TCPSocketMessage message)
      Deprecated. 
      Will append a SocketMessage onto the outgoing queue of messages to be delivered to a bound socket client.
      void closeBoundSocketChannel()
      Deprecated. 
      Close the current bound SocketChannel.

    • Method Detail

      • appendOutgoingQueue

        boolean appendOutgoingQueue(TCPSocketMessage message)
        Deprecated. 
        Will append a SocketMessage onto the outgoing queue of messages to be delivered to a bound socket client.
        Parameters:
        message - SocketMessage to be asynchronously sent to client
        Returns:
        true if successfully added to queue

      • closeBoundSocketChannel

        void closeBoundSocketChannel()
        Deprecated. 
        Close the current bound SocketChannel. If the session is bound to other ITCPSocketService implementations, those services will receive an unsetserverCallback call.

        ITCPSocketService implementations should use this for exceptions or errors, not as a typical client-server interaction. It is preferred that clients close the session or the session times out.
